channel.title: RSS Aggregator Feed
channel.description: An aggregated feed of Technology-related news

item.title: Samsung divulgâche la principale nouveauté de ses Galaxy S26
item.description: Samsung semble avoir vendu la mèche avant l’heure. Alors que la présentation officielle du Galaxy S26 Ultra n’est attendue qu’en février 2026, la fiche d’un nouveau chargeur 60 W publiée sur le site du constructeur laisse peu de place au doute : le futur fleuron sud-coréen devrait enfin profiter d’une vitesse de charge en nette hausse, après plusieurs générations limitées à 45 W....

item.title: Google is rolling out a Pixel Camera 10.2 update that seems to be getting users even more confused
item.description: What you see after the Pixel Camera 10.2 update will depend on the model of Pixel you've got.

item.title: Meet B&O’s elite new Phantom and Mirage speakers — if you need to know the price, you can't afford them
item.description: It’s POA only for Bang & Olufsen’s huge multi-driver speakers in ‘Phantom’ or ‘Mirage’

item.title: South Park season 28 episode 5 ending gives us the Christmas miracle we've been waiting for (almost)
item.description: South Park season 28 is finally over, and episode 5 gave us the moment we've all been waiting for... even in real-life.

item.title: From Hack to Hijack: Thieves Hit the Vape Truck, Steal $1 Million Worth of E-Cigs
item.description: Up in smoke.

item.title: Best Merino Wool Clothing (2025): Base Layers, Hoodies, Jackets & More
item.description: Merino is one of the best fabrics you can wear. We explain the different blends, what “gsm” means, and how to care for your clothes.

item.title: Pluie de remise sur les aspirateurs Dreame : voici 4 offres pour un intérieur impeccable avant Noël [Sponso]
item.description: Et si Noël était aussi l’occasion de faire le plein de bonnes affaires ? Jusqu’au 24 décembre, le spécialiste des aspirateurs intelligents Dreame affiche jusqu’à 220 euros de remise sur ses meilleures références de l’année.

item.title: Save up to 40% with Autodesk’s Media & Entertainment Collection
item.description: Save up to 40% with Autodesk’s Media & Entertainment Collection

item.title: Ce que vous voyez là… c’est la Lune : cette photo incroyable a remporté un prix international de photo !
item.description: Comme chaque année, le Royal Museums Greenwish, une association de musées en Angleterre, récompense les meilleures photographes du ciel. Une image complètement déformée de la Lune a suscité l'étonnement.

item.title: Kamrui Mini PCs Join Amazon’s Holiday Clearance at Record Low, Plus an Extra Discount Code to Rival the Mac Mini
item.description: Two of KAMRUI's very best mini PCs are worth a (very small) spot on your desk, especially at these new prices.

item.title: This new Android phone is designed for everyone who misses the Xperia Play and N-Gage
item.description: The Ayaneo Pocket Play is coming to Kickstarter soon, and it promises to serve as a true handheld console, while also being a full Android phone.

item.title: Microsoft stops breaking Windows 11 – instead it just made Phone Link even better with Android apps
item.description: Like to run Android apps on Windows 11 using Phone Link? A new feature is coming that's sure to please.

item.title: Fini les réglages hasardeux sur Steam Deck : l’outil indispensable pour optimiser vos jeux en 2 clics
item.description: L'application DeckSettings permet de trouver rapidement les bons réglages pour profiter de son Steam Deck dans les meilleures conditions.

item.title: Convicted Crypto Wallet Developer Warns Miners Will Be Next in Bitcoin Crackdown
item.description: Many in the crypto world have been pleased with Trump's friendly treatment. Others still think the government is out to get them.

item.title: Want the same milk and eggs? Instacart might charge you more than your neighbor
item.description: Volunteers in four cities found a 75% rate of price discrepancies on identical products, raising questions about Instacart’s AI-powered pricing strategy. Instacart’s artificial intelligence-enabled pricing may be increasing the cost of your groceries by as much as $1,200 a year, according to a new study published on Monday.

item.title: Des apps bannies par les États-Unis ont prospéré dans les boutiques d’Apple et Google
item.description: Des dizaines d’applications directement liées à des organisations sanctionnées par les autorités américaines sont distribuées par l’App Store et le Play Store, en contradiction totale avec la législation US. Apple et Google ont commencé le ménage.

item.title: Independent auditors inspect NordVPN's security once again – here's what they found
item.description: Nineteen senior testers from German cybersecurity firm Cure53 spent months scrutinizing NordVPN's apps, servers, and source code. Here’s what they discovered.

item.title: Hugh Jackman Says ‘It Doesn’t Feel Like the End’ for Wolverine
item.description: He was last seen in 'Deadpool & Wolverine,' but could Jackman return in 'Avengers: Doomsday' or 'Secret Wars'?

item.title: Laptops Have Never Been Cheaper. That Trend Might Reverse in 2026
item.description: Despite all the worries about the economy, laptop prices have never been lower. But in 2026, all of that could change.

item.title: Seagate's limited edition Astro Bot PS5 hard drive releases today, and it's the perfect PlayStation gift this holiday – here's why and where to buy it
item.description: The new Astro Bot PS5 external hard drive from Sony and Seagate launches today – here's why it's a great gift this holiday season.

item.title: Supergirl trailer launch live: all of the build-up, news, and rumors before the DCU movie's teaser is released
item.description: The first trailer for Supergirl will be released later today – and TechRadar will be covering it live.

item.title: The Apple Watch just got its coolest upgrade in years – you can now talk to your DJI drone from your wrist
item.description: DJI looks set to push out a couple more products before a US ban is expected to come into effect on 23 December.

item.title: I thought every gaming headset was embarrassing to wear until I saw this new model from Final
item.description: The Final VR3000 EX is a new gaming headset with a refreshingly classy design.

item.title: « C’est un désastre » : le portage de Skyrim sur Switch 2 rend le jeu injouable
item.description: Skyrim est sorti sur Switch 2 cette semaine à la surprise générale. Mais le RPG désormais culte de Bethesda est dans un état qui ne justifie pour l'instant pas son tarif de 60 euros.

item.title: À seulement 138 €, cet écran PC Mini-LED de 25″ (144 Hz) conviendra aux gamers exigeants, sans se ruiner
item.description: Si beaucoup de moniteurs gaming optent pour la technologie QD-OLED, d'autres utilisent le QD-Mini LED, comme ce TCL 25G54. Un écran PC de 25 pouces à 144 Hz dont le prix tombe à seulement 138 euros, au lieu de 199 euros.

item.title: Here’s how to unlock Kim Kardashian in Fortnite, and when the megastar is set to arrive in-game
item.description: Kim Kardashian Fortnite skins arrive later this week. You can even unlock them early. Here's what you need to know.

item.title: « Cela ne se passe jamais comme prévu » : comment cette nouvelle usine française de batteries pour voitures électriques compte éviter les désastres des concurrents
item.description: La gigafactory de Verkor, une société française de fabrication de batteries pour voitures électriques, est inaugurée aujourd'hui. Située à Dunkerque, elle est un espoir pour l'industrie française, mais les exemples récents prouvent que le plus dur reste à venir.

item.title: Webb Traces Distant Explosion to Oldest Supernova Ever Observed
item.description: The ancient stellar death took place when the universe was a mere 730 million years old.

item.title: 16TB of corporate intelligence data exposed in one of the largest lead-generation dataset leaks
item.description: We've just witnessed the mother of all leaks as researchers found an unprotected behemoth database.

item.title: Leapmotor D19 : plus de 1 000 km d’autonomie pour cette voiture électrique chinoise de Stellantis qui inaugure une technologie allemande
item.description: Dévoilé au mois d’octobre 2025, le nouveau Leapmotor D19 se décline en une version équipée d’un prolongateur d’autonomie. Fourni par l’équipementier allemand ZF, ce dernier possède une petite particularité. Il pourrait arriver en Europe grâce à Stellantis.

item.title: Smartphones Samsung : ces deux modèles incontournables arriveraient plus tôt que prévu
item.description: Les Galaxy A37 et A57 pourraient arriver plus tôt que prévu, ce qui bousculerait le calendrier habituel de Samsung.

item.title: The Dyson V11 is a fantastic vacuum to buy while it’s still at its Black Friday price
item.description: The Dyson V11 is a superb vacuum cleaner for most homes. It's currently available at a great price right now at Amazon. Here's why you need it in your life.

item.title: Android just got a life-saving upgrade that lets you share live video with emergency rescuers – here's how it works
item.description: Android Emergency Live Video is a new feature that lets you show responders what you can see, so they can better assist you.

item.title: Adobe sees a bright future as AI bet pays off
item.description: Entrenching generative AI into Adobe's creative software ecosystem is paying off, according to the company's latest earnings. While its share price has fallen by more than 37 percent this year at the time of writing, Adobe is reporting a bump in annual profits driven by record revenue of $23.77 billion for 2025 - an 11 […]

item.title: The SteelSeries Arctis Nova 7 Gen 2 gaming headset dips back down to a lowest-ever UK price
item.description: The SteelSeries Arctis Nova 7 Gen 2 is at its lowest price in a year, and I highly recommend it for the companion app and custom game profiles.

item.title: Games Workshop Has Finally Learned Its Lesson
item.description: After months of silence, the 'Warhammer 40,000' creator has decided on a new way to sell its fancy books without them being immediately scalped by resellers.

item.title: Port raises $100M at $800M valuation to take on Spotify’s Backstage
item.description: Port offers a proprietary alternative to Spotify's popular devtool catalog Backstage, but with a valuable addition: it can be used to manage AI agents, too.

item.title: Runware raises $50M Series A to help make image, video generation easier for developers
item.description: Runware lets developers integrate realtime image generation in their apps, with an affordable pricing model.

item.title: The Rings of Power season 3 has officially wrapped filming, and I've got thoughts about when it'll launch on Prime Video
item.description: Prime Video has confirmed that filming has wrapped on The Rings of Power's third season.

item.title: These basketball courts double as a hidden flood defense
item.description: On an typical day, it’s a place to play. But in extreme rain, this new infrastructure captures rain like a pool. They look like ordinary basketball courts. But two new courts built next to public housing in New York City double as flood prevention.

item.title: 2026 might be the year we finally give up on fashion trends
item.description: A new report from StitchFix finds that its customers are suffering from ‘trend fatigue.’ Remember earlier this year when everyone on your feed was wearing bizarre shoes, like Maison Margiella’s ballerina flats with split toes and mesh ballet flats? Or when statement scrunchies were all the rage? Don’t feel bad if you missed it. Blink, and the trend was over. ...

item.title: Why the U.S. oil industry is skeptical of Trump’s ‘pro-petroleum’ plans
item.description: Executive orders or political slogans may set a tone or direction, but they cannot override the fundamental requirement for profitability. As the Trump administration makes announcement after announcement about its efforts to promote the U.S. fossil fuel industry, the industry isn’t exactly jumping at new opportunities.

item.title: ‘A willingness to lie’: Why the EPA’s latest Trump-era change is especially concerning
item.description: The agency’s web page explaining the causes of climate change has been modified to the point that it is now false, says climate scientist Daniel Swain. Human activity is driving climate change; that’s a fact that more than 99.9% of scientific papers agree on.
